name: Vegan Crepes
author: Siri
summary: This is the first recipe for crepes that I have ever been able to make right.  I was psyched that I didn't have to use egg replacer because it is such a pain in the neck.  So here you vegans go and enjoy but don't eat too many too fast like I did cause now I have a belly ache!!!!  For a twist, replace the maple syrup with hazelnut syrup, or any other flavor you like. If you want to throw some semi-sweet chocolate chips on the top and fold the crepe up over them, they melt and get all gushy on the inside. Makes about 16 crepes with a 6-inch diameter.
directions: In a large mixing bowl, blend soy milk, water, 1/4 cup margarine, sugar, syrup, flour, and salt
Cover and chill the mixture for 2 hours
Lightly grease a 5 to 6 inch skillet with some soy margarine
Pour approximately 3 tablespoons batter into the skillet
Swirl to make the batter cover the skillet's bottom
Cook until golden, flip and cook on opposite side
